34 class NetworkFactory
35 {
36 public:
41  template<class T, class D>
42  void RegisterTransport(const D& descriptor)
43  {
44  std::unique_ptr<T> transport(new T(descriptor));
45  if(transport->init())
46  mRegisteredTransports.emplace_back(std::move(transport));
47  }
48

74 
75  void NormalizeLocators(LocatorList_t& locators);
76 
77  size_t numberOfRegisteredTransports() const;
78 
79 private:
80  std::vector<std::unique_ptr<TransportInterface> > mRegisteredTransports;
81 };
